name: Loot Box Catcher
description:
This game is my entry for the Surprise Pizza Jam (January 2019).

Theme

“Your take on a modern game cliché”

Make a game that highlights/improves a mechanic/technique you don't like in modern game design.

I chose "Loot boxes and microtransactions".

Description

It's an Ape Escape inspired game, where you explore the map to catch all the loot boxes.

Can you catch them all ? Will you open all of them ? Will your bank call you after you finished the game ?

Note : The game has no sounds.

Controls

  • Move : WASD or Arrows Keys
  • Camera : Mouse
  • Use the net : Left click
  • Jump : Space

Things used

  • Engine : Unity
  • Textures : Bark, Grass-1, Grass-2, Pebbles-1, Pebbles-2
  • Fonts : Fredoka One, Righteous
